The story is rich in emotion and explores themes of love, class, and social expectations that are still relevant today.

Directed by Vishal Bhardwaj, it's an adaptation of Shakespeare's "Macbeth", set in the world of organized crime. The movie stars Irrfan Khan, Tabu, and Naseeruddin Shah - all excellent actors who bring depth to their characters.
